column2:
"<%me>.
Do you know why I'm
here and not in the Mothership?"
"I... like watching people doing what they do best."
"Looking at people, I too feel alive."
"Matoi... she used to come and see me here. So carefree and such."
"I never understood how she could be so pure and innocent, no matter what trouble she would bring upon herself. I never got tired of seeing that."
"She keeps trying to do her best, ever since 10 years ago. I know, I've seen it."
"We, Matoi, have gone through so much... I won't let this be the end."
